nodes.text: Star Wars: New Jedi Order Round-Robin Interview

"Star Wars: New Jedi Order Round-Robin Interview" is a round-table discussion that was included as an extra in The New Jedi Order: The Unifying Force, the last volume of Star Wars: The New Jedi Order. The Del Rey–moderated conversation featured Lucy Wilson, Shelly Shapiro, Sue Rostoni, and James Luceno, and it focused on the conception and history of the New Jedi Order series.
